definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
offering memorandum (for public stock issue)/publication memorandum

sentences.english: In the memo, the Argentine side recognized China's market economy status.
sentences.chinese: 在备忘录中，阿方正式承认中国的市场经济地位。

sentences.english: Copies of both notes were obtained by The Associated Press on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 所有备忘录的副本被美联社于周一时得到。

sentences.english: You can also use a tickler file to supplement this.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以使用一个备忘录文件作为增补。

sentences.english: See the "Guide to Writing Effective Policy Memos" and the student examples below.
sentences.chinese: 参见作业部份“有效政策备忘录指南”和学生范文。

sentences.english: Thee essay is well-written with a standard format of legal letters, legal memoranda and briefs.
sentences.chinese: 缇律师信函，法律备忘录，案件辩论书格式准确。
有关适航性的警告性备忘录。

sentences.english: Use your PDA or computer to set up those long-term ticklers .
sentences.chinese: 用你的掌上电脑或台式电脑创立那些长期的备忘录。

sentences.english: The text of the memorandums of understanding or agreements.
sentences.chinese: 谅解备忘录或协议的文本。

sentences.english: I use a quick mental checklist each day to help me stay balanced.
sentences.chinese: 我每天使用一种迅速脑力备忘录帮助我保持平衡。

sentences.english: This is the time you do your offline work – write memos, write code, etc.
sentences.chinese: 这个时间你可以做线下工作，比如写备忘录什么的。
巴西国家计量局必须批准合作备忘录。

sentences.english: On January 26, President Obama signed two related presidential memorandums.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统1月26日签署了两项有关的总统备忘录。

sentences.english: Title Technical Memorandum on Procedures and Methods for Sampling and Analysis of Trade Effluents .
sentences.chinese: 工商业污水采样与分析的步骤及方法技术备忘录。

sentences.english: Type correspondence, memorandums, circulars, reports etc.
sentences.chinese: 打印信件，备忘录及报告等。

sentences.english: If it's an explainable variance memo that's needed, then write one.
sentences.chinese: 如果有必要使用意见分歧备忘录，那么就写下来。

sentences.english: Along with a copy of the minutes of the last meeting.
sentences.chinese: 里面还装有一份前次会议的备忘录副本。

definition: first draft/to draw up (a first version)
